verses.text: ‘OKU OU ‘ofa au kia Sihova, Koe‘uhi kuo ne ongona hoku le‘o mo ‘eku hūfia
Ko e me‘a ‘i he‘ene ofe‘i hono fofonga kia kita, Ko ia, te u tautapa kiate ia ‘i hoto ngaahi ‘aho kotoa.
Na‘e ha‘o au ‘e he ngaahi kafa ‘a Mate; Na‘e mo‘utāmakia au ‘e he ngaahi kupenga ‘a Hētesi ē; Ne u ‘ilo ‘a e faingata‘a‘ia mo e mamahi pē
Ka ko e huafa ‘o Sihova ne u tautapa ki ai, “Sihova ē, fakahaofi mu‘a ‘eku mo‘ui.”
Ko e ‘ofa ‘a Sihova, mo e faitotonu foki; ‘Io, ko hotau ‘Otua ‘oku ne faka‘atu‘i.
‘Oku tauhi ‘e Sihova ‘a si‘i fo‘ou: Na‘a ku tu‘utāmaki, pea ne fakamo‘ui au.
Foki ki ho nonga‘anga, ‘e hoku laumālie; He kuo hulu ‘a e ‘ofa ‘a Sihova kiate koe.
He kuo ke hamusi hoku laumālie mei he mate, ‘O ‘oua ‘e tetē he lo‘imata hoku mata, pe humu hoku va‘e.
Te u taka ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e ‘Eiki, ‘I he ngaahi fonua ‘o ha‘a mo‘ui.
Kuo u tui eni–he na‘e pau ke u ‘a‘au: Ko e taha au na‘e ngaohikovia fau.
Ko e taha au na‘a ku pehē ‘i he‘eku hoha‘a, “Ko e koto loi ‘a e kakai kotoa.”
Te u totongi fēfē kia Sihova ‘a e fu‘u hulu ‘ene ‘ofa kia kita?
Te u hiki ‘a e ipu fakamo‘ui, ‘O hu‘ekina ‘a e huafa ‘o e ‘Eiki.
Te u fakaai ‘eku ngaahi tukumo‘ui kia Sihova ‘Io, ka u fai mu‘a ‘i he ‘ao ‘o hono kakai kotoa.
‘Oku mahu‘inga ‘i he ‘ao ‘o Sihova ‘a e pekia ‘a hono ‘ofa‘anga.
Tauange mo Sihova– He ko ho‘o tamaio‘eiki kita: Ko ho‘o tamaio‘eiki mo e tama ‘a ho‘o kaunanga; Kuo ke vete hoku ngaahi kafa.
Te u feia ki he ‘Afiona ‘a e feilaulau fakafeta‘i, ‘O u hu‘ekina ‘a e huafa ‘o e ‘Eiki.
Te u fakaai ‘eku ngaahi tukumo‘ui kia Sihova, ‘Io, ka u fai mu‘a ‘i he ‘ao hono kakai kotoa;
‘I he ngaahi loto‘ā ‘o e fale ‘o Sihova, ‘I he lotolotonga ‘o‘ou, si‘i Selusalema. Halelu‘ia!
